title: Dice With Buddies v4.14.1
description:
Dice mania is a full-blown epidemic and the game just got BETTER! Find out for yourself why everyone's getting hooked on this addictive dice game.

You can play with friends, family, or random opponents--whether they're sitting next to you or thousands of miles away! With our BRAND NEW Custom Dice, improved interface, Biggest Winner event and PREMIUM tournaments, playing has never been easier or more exciting!

â€¢ Become the Biggest Winner! Accumulate as many head-to-head wins as possible for huge XP and bonus roll prizes!
â€¢ Exhilarating multiplayer dice game similar to Hasbro, Inc.â€™s YAHTZEEÂ® dice game

â€¢ Play the in-game scratchers to win bonus rolls
â€¢ Challenge friends and family throughor find a random opponent
â€¢ Use in-game chat to talk with and heckle your opponents
â€¢ Activate a bonus roll to get an extra boost right when you need it
â€¢ Play from the same account on any Android tablet or phone!

What's New:

Be sure to visit the Dice Pole and check out our Holiday Celebration events to earn prizes like Custom Dice, Bonus Rolls and so much more. Weâ€™ve added exclusive Vanity Frames, so now you can show your opponents what makes you a true Dice Master!
